sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 A farmer sells his product at a loss of 35\%. If his S.P. was Rs 19500, what was his actual loss? What was his cost price?
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
 $$ \text{ Let the C.P be } x $$
 $$ \text { We have, S.P. = Rs } \input[s1v1]{}, 
 \text{ Loss } = \input[s1v2][2em]{}\% $$
 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$ \text{ Loss = } \frac{\input[s2v1]{}}{100}\times 
 x=\frac{7x}{\input[s2v2][2em]{}} $$
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$ \text{ S.P. = C.P. - Loss } $$
 \[19500 = x - \frac{\input[s3v1][2em]{}x}{20}\]
 \[19500 =\frac{13x}{\input[s3v2][2em]{}}\]
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
 \[x =Rs \input[s4v1]{}\]
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$ \text{ Loss = } \input[s5v1]{} - 19500 = Rs \input[s5v2]{} $$ 
 "}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [19500, 35], "text": " $$ \text{ Please refer back to the question. The sales price is 
 mentioned as Rs 19500 and loss percentage as 35 percent. } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [35, 20], "text": " $$ \text {35 percent means } \frac{35}{100} 
 \text{ which becomes } \frac{7}{20} \text { after simplification.} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [7, 20], "text": " $$ \text{ Loss is } \frac{7}{20} \text{ from previous 
 step and after simplification, RHS becomes } \frac{13x}{20} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [30000], "text": " 
 $$ \text{ Please pay attention to expression reduction. }
 x = \frac{19500 \times 20}{13} = 30000 $$ 
 "}, {"data": [30000, 10500], "text": " 
 \text{Loss = C.P - S.P. Cost Price was } x 
 \text { and, we derived it as 30000 in previous set and S.P was 19500 
 as given in the question. } "}]
